text: Felice Gimondi (; 29 September 1942 – 16 August 2019) was an Italian professional racing cyclist. He won all three Grand Tours of road cycling: Tour de France (1965, his first year as a pro), Giro d'Italia (1967, 1969 and 1976), and Vuelta a España (1968).Felice Gimondi . Cycling Hall of Fame. He remains one of only seven cyclists to have done so.Mehl, Cathy. . astana- cyclingteam.com Gimondi died on 16 August 2019 from a heart attack while swimming on vacation in Sicily.Italië rouwt om wielerlegende Felice Gimondi (76) He was 76. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian cyclists Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Felice Gimondi
